definitions.title: wring out
definitions.body: (NH = BH (si vera 1., v. Levy:NHWB iv. 444 and reff.));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִרְטֵנִי]] Job 16:11 upon the hands of wicked men he wrings me out, but read prob. ´[[יִֽרְ]]: √ [[יׇרַט]] (Di Bu Du al.), q.v. p. 437
